name: Roultaboul
description:
Roultaboul (translated as Rollyoball) is my first Unity (4) game, created in 2014.

It is based on the Roll-a-ball tutorial, and was created for a french contest.

Controls :

  • Directional arrows to move
  • R to restart
  • M redirects to the main menu
  • Q to quit the game
  • K to skip after the 10th try
